text_en: The teacher gives her lesson to the class orally.
text_sw: Mwalimu anafundisha somo lake kwa darasa kwa kutumia mdomo.

text_en: Rose is not perceiving orally what is said.
She is dependent on her classmates interpretation.
Roses classmate is interpreting while the rest of the class are communicating with the teacher.
text_sw: Mwanafunzi mwenza wa Rose anamfasiria wakati watoto wengine wanawasiliana na mwalimu.

text_en: Rose's attention is towards the interpreter.
text_sw: Usikivu wa Rose unaelekezwa kwa mkalimani.
